item.title: Ethereum Market Cap Surpasses Mastercard, Netflix
item.description: On August 10th, based on the data from 8marketcap, the market capitalization of Ethereum ($519.27 billion) exceeded that of Mastercard ($519.19 billion) and Netflix ($514.85 billion). With a 7-day growth rate of 26.02%, it temporarily ranked 25th on the global asset market capitalization list.

item.title: Base Layer Token Eco Soars, ZORA Surges Over 19% to Hit New All-Time High
item.description: On August 10, according to HTX market data, the Base ecosystem tokens witnessed a general upward trend. They include:· ZORA increased by more than 19% in the past 24 hours, with a market capitalization reaching $3.11 billion and hitting a new all-time high;· AERO rose by more than 18% in the past 24 hours, with a market capitalization reaching $10.91 billion;· CLANKER surged by more than 31% in the past 24 hours, with a market capitalization reaching $66.52 million;· KTA went up by more than 18% in the past 24 hours, with a market capitalization reaching $5.96 billion;· BIO rose by more than 17% in the past 24 hours, with a market capitalization reaching $2.10 billion.

item.title: An address has dollar-cost averaged 2 million PROVE tokens at an average price of $1, with an unrealized gain of over $870,000.
item.description: August 10. Based on the analysis of crypto analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, the address 0xD5B...B9c0a has accumulated 2 million PROVE tokens within the past three days with an average price of 1 USD. Currently, it is showing an unrealized gain of $873,000. And it has now staked all the tokens.

item.title: Stability DAO: Nearly 30% of Metavault Funds Affected by CrediX Exploit, Working on Compensation Plan
item.description: On August 10th, the DeFi protocol Stability DAO declared that around 20% to 30% of its Metavault funds were impacted by the CrediX exploit. Stability DAO is collaborating with Sonic Labs and other affected protocols. It is working on writing a detailed report to keep track of the team and the attacker, with the aim of recovering the funds.Meanwhile, the protocol is formulating a compensation and recovery plan, and it is expected to start implementation within the next two weeks. MetaVault is expected to reopen next week, and more details will be announced. It is reported that Stability DAO completed the integration with CrediX approximately a week ago, which brought additional yield opportunities to the platform.

item.title: PROVE surged above $1.57 this morning, with a 24-hour gain of over 40%.
item.description: On August 10th, according to HTX market data, PROVE briefly surged to above $1.57 this morning. It witnessed a 24-hour increase of more than 40%. Currently, it has dropped to $1.40, and its market capitalization is $279 million.

item.title: Strobe Ventures Sells 7 Million ENA at an Average Price of $0.726
item.description: On August 10th, based on the monitoring of @EmberCN, the Strobe Ventures address transferred 7 million ENA to Binance yesterday. And it withdrew 5.087 million USDC 8 hours ago. This indicates that the 7 million ENA was sold at an average price of $0.726.At the time of this writing, ENA is currently trading at $0.7474, with a 24-hour increase of 16.65%.

item.title: Eugene "Pump Signal" NFT, this collection's performance will outpace that of the "ETH Beta" coin.
item.description: August 10th, Trader Eugene Ng Ah Sio took to his personal channel and said, "The so-called 'Leveraged ETH Beta' concept keeps coming up in the minds of speculators as long as the underlying asset is in a trend. At different times, the market will favor different names (assets). But all these names have the same shortcoming - their 'Beta' performance is not satisfactory."The definition of Beta indicates that as the price of the underlying asset fluctuates, the volatility of the Beta asset should be greater than that of the underlying asset (correlation > 1). For all other altcoins, this means that funds need to flow from ETH to the altcoin. In the past, when there were limited optional assets, this logic worked. But in today's market, with a large number of projects vying to become the 'preferred ETH Beta,' people easily get confused.However, there is still a relatively low-profile type of asset, which is NFTs. Their uniqueness lies in the fact that their price is denominated in ETH

item.title: Ethereum Surges Above $4300 This Morning, with a 24-hour Gain of 6.88%
item.description: On August 10, according to HTX market data, Ethereum broke through $4300 this morning. It is currently trading at $4295.30, with a 24-hour price increase of 6.88%. The market capitalization has risen to $518.705 billion.

item.title: White House Cryptocurrency Committee Executive Director Bo Hines to Step Down, Return to Private Sector
item.description: On August 10th, as per crypto journalist Eleanor Terrett, Bo Hines, the Executive Director of the White House Cryptocurrency Council, is scheduled to leave his post and return to the private sector.Before joining the Trump administration, Hines worked as a partner at a growth equity investment firm. After his departure, he will continue to provide assistance in artificial intelligence affairs in a special government employee capacity, along with David Sacks, the White House cryptocurrency and AI lead.Hines's deputy, Patrick Witt, is anticipated to assume the acting directorship. Further updates will be provided.

item.title: GMX touched $45 this morning, experiencing a "flash crash", and has since dropped to $22.26.
item.description: On August 10th, based on HTX market data, GMX "dropped like a needle" to $45 at 4:36 this morning. It is now falling back to $22.26, with a 24-hour increase of 53.71%, pushing its market capitalization to $226 million.According to BWEnews' analysis, "Before the GMX price began to fluctuate, a large volume of trading first emerged on Hyperliquid's GMX-USD perpetual contract. For instance, from 4:12:46 to 4:13:45, $800,000 worth of GMX was traded on the Hyperliquid perpetual contract. Subsequently, the price on Binance started to surge at 4:14:41."
